name: India
fact: India has the world’s largest postal network with over 150,000 post offices, including a floating one on Dal Lake.

name: Japan
fact: Japan has more pets than children and vending machines for everything, including hot meals and umbrellas.

name: Canada
fact: Canada has the longest coastline in the world, over 202,000 kilometers long.

name: Russia
fact: Russia spans 11 time zones and covers more land area than Pluto.

name: Brazil
fact: Brazil houses the Amazon Rainforest, which generates over 20% of the world’s oxygen.

name: Switzerland
fact: Switzerland has remained neutral in all wars since 1815.

name: Australia
fact: Australia is wider than the moon and has more kangaroos than people.

name: China
fact: The Great Wall of China stretches over 21,000 kilometers.

name: Iceland
fact: Iceland runs almost entirely on renewable energy and has no army.

name: Bhutan
fact: Bhutan measures national progress using Gross National Happiness instead of GDP.
